meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal brightness.
meanings.sent1: The isophotes on the map show areas with the same level of brightness.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use isophotes to analyze the distribution of light in the image.
meanings.sent3: The isophotes on the map decided where the best spot for a picnic would be.
meanings.sent4: Her smile created an isophote of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The isophotes on the map looked like colorful threads weaving through the landscape.

meanings.definition: A curve on a graph representing points of equal illumination.
meanings.sent1: The isophotes on the graph helped visualize the areas with the same brightness.
meanings.sent2: The photographer adjusted the lighting based on the isophotes displayed on the graph.
meanings.sent3: The isophotes on the graph seemed to dance as the light changed.
meanings.sent4: Her voice created an isophote of warmth in the room.
meanings.sent5: The isophotes on the graph resembled waves of light flowing across the page.
